article.title: Dell Federal Systems to Provide U.S. Marine Corps Systems Command with Hardware Suite Support
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Dell Federal Systems has received an indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity delivery order for $13,969,235 by the U.S. Marine Corps Systems Command (MCSC). Dell will provide Marine Corps hardware suite support for the MCSC program manager for training systems. The Marine Corps Systems Command, Quantico, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
